name: Hazard Suit Proficiency
description: Subject may use the Hazard Suit without penalty. Grants additional damage reduction of 2/- per class level. Counts as Light Armor Proficiency.

name: The Silent One
description: Subject suffers a -10 penalty to skill checks when speaking

name: Hazard Weapon Storage
description: The Hazard Suit can store one (1) weapon for each Exotic Weapon Aptitude or Proficiency. This storage is only accessible by the wearer and counts as an extra-dimensional space.

name: Exotic Weapon Aptitude 1
description: Subject gains proficiency with one (1) exotic weapon of choice. The weapon of choice may be changed by practicing with a new weapon for one (1) hour. This counts as Exotic Weapon Proficiency.
